Package dvr

Class Location

java.lang.Object
dvr.Location
public class Location extends Object
Contains the information about a single location. This class is to be treated as read-only once constructed.

    • Location

      public Location()
      Default location constructor.

    • Location

      public Location(long x, long y, String label)
      Location constructor with information specified.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of this location.
      y - Y-coordinate of this location.
      label - An optional name used to identify this location.

    • Location

      public Location(Location src)
      Copy constructor for location data.
      Parameters:
      src - The source location which should be copied.

    • RandomList

      public static Location[] RandomList(int count, int range)
      Returns a list of random locations.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of locations to generate within the list.
      range - The maximum absolute coordinate of any location (maybe negative).
